mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, status FROM tb_user WHERE username = #{userName}
SELECT b.role_id FROM tb_user a LEFT JOIN tb_user_role b ON a.id = b.user_id WHERE b.user_id = #{id}
SELECT a.url, CONCAT( '[', GROUP_CONCAT( b.role_id ), ']' ) AS role_ids FROM tb_permission a LEFT JOIN tb_role_permission b ON a.id = b.permission_id GROUP BY a.url
